channel.title: Need help from good coder

item.title: Need help from good coder
item.dc:creator: @zilchuary zilchuary
item.description:
@zilchuary wrote:

[quote=“xXx JAVA OWNZ U xXx, post:5, topic:155888”]ok to make it talk to need to add this to npchandler by search for

if (npcs[i].npcType ==

now under the

                            }
            }

add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 636) { if (misc.random2(22) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "TYPE WANT YOU WANT HER TO SAY HERE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! } } [/quote]
Thats right good jof java
++

item.title: Need help from good coder
item.dc:creator: @xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx xXx JAVA OWNZ U xXx
item.description:
@xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx wrote:

ok to make it talk to need to add this to npchandler by search for

if (npcs[i].npcType ==

now under the

                            }
            }

add this

if (npcs[i].npcType == 636) {
						if (misc.random2(22) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "TYPE WANT YOU WANT HER TO SAY HERE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
						}
					}

spawn = 636 3256 3430 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 1 cheerleader

item.title: Need help from good coder
item.dc:creator: @fatcat fatcat
item.description:
@fatcat wrote:

OK, I’l give you an example, just open up your npchandler.java

if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("fatcat2248")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Hello and welcome to Fatcats Frenzy"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "Owner fatcat2248 is offline"; } } } if (npcs[i].npcType == 945) {

What that code does is make an npc when i’m online

the text update bit is what the npc says and the npc type is what npc it is…

you need to place the npc somewhere though using the autospawn.cfg
